## Description
`r gsub("\\n", " ", packageDescription("toolStability", fields = "Description"))`

## Installation
The package can be installed from CRAN as follows:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages('toolStability', dependencies=TRUE)
```

The development version can be installed from github as follows:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
if (!require('devtools')) install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github("Illustratien/toolStability")
# or
if (!require('remotes')) install.packages('remotes')
remotes::install_github("Illustratien/toolStability")
```

## Detailed tutorial
For a detailed tutorial (vignette) on how to used this package type:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
browseVignettes(package = 'toolStability')
```

The vignette for the latest version is also available [online](https://illustratien.github.io/toolStability/articles/toolStability.html).
